fr.tactik.game

Class ControlerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.tactik.game.ControlerPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class ControlerPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener
    This is the ControlerPlayer Class. This class manage all events from the keyboard and textures of player when a key is pressed.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Juliette Belin, Alice Neichols, Denis Tribouillois
